title: Report Graffiti
description: A citizen is reporting graffiti on a public building.

tasks.description: Collect the location of the graffiti and a description.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent accurately documents the location and nature of the graffiti.

tasks.description: Create a service request for the graffiti removal crew.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully creates a work order.

tasks.description: Provide the citizen with a service request number.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent gives the citizen a tracking number.
